metadata.title: Isatin derivatives in reactions with phosphorus(III-V) compounds R E V I E W

abstract.original_text: In this review we generalize and analyze information about reactions between isatin and three-, four-, and five-coordinate phosphorus compounds, published between 1966 and 2014. Ph 3 P COOR P O OR OR O Me P H O RO RO
